decks.notes: The deck focuses on maximizing tempo and disruption with a mix of efficient threats and versatile answers. With a well-rounded suite of counterspells and removal spells, as well as powerful creatures like True-Name Nemesis and Brazen Borrower, the deck aims to pressure the opponent while disrupting their game plan. The inclusion of cards like Sword to Plowshares and Lightning Bolt ensures that the deck has answers to a wide range of threats. Aragorn, King of Gondor, serves as a versatile and resilient commander, providing a strong threat on the battlefield while also offering valuable utility. Overall, the deck seeks to maintain a proactive game plan while keeping the opponent off-balance with disruption and threats.

The deck focuses on utilizing a wide variety of aggressive creatures and spells to overwhelm the opponent quickly. It includes a mix of efficient removal spells, cheap creatures to apply pressure early, and powerful cards like Skullclamp and Parallax Wave to generate card advantage and control the board. The deck also includes a number of utility creatures and spells to support the aggro strategy, such as Giver of Runes for protection and Thraben Inspector for card draw. The mana base is carefully constructed to ensure consistent access to the deck's powerful spells and creatures, allowing the player to maintain pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan throughout the match.

This deck focuses on utilizing a wide range of control elements to disrupt the opponent's game plan while efficiently drawing cards and generating value through Niv-Mizzet Reborn's ability. The deck includes a diverse selection of removal spells, counterspells, and card draw effects to maintain control of the game. Additionally, the deck incorporates a variety of versatile cards that can answer different threats and adapt to different situations. Niv-Mizzet Reborn serves as a powerful card advantage engine, allowing the player to access a wide range of powerful multicolored cards from their deck. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to control the game through disruption and card advantage, using Niv-Mizzet Reborn as a powerful centerpiece to outvalue the opponent.

The deck focuses on generating a constant stream of small creatures that can be sacrificed or used for various abilities to chip away at the opponent's life total. It utilizes a combination of aggressive creatures like Slimefoot and Squee, along with a range of support cards for mana ramp, creature recursion, and removal. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of small threats and disruption, while utilizing the commander's abilities to generate value and maintain a steady flow of creatures on the battlefield. The deck's strategy centers around adapting to the opponent's game plan and making efficient use of resources to secure victory in a fast-paced, one-on-one duel setting.

The deck focuses on using aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. The commander, Ghyrson Starn, Kelermorph, supports this strategy by providing additional value through abilities like creating tokens or recurring spells from the graveyard. The deck includes a mix of low-cost creatures like Goblin Bombardment and Sokenzan, Crucible of Defiance, along with direct damage spells like Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning. It also utilizes counterspells like Force of Will and Spell Pierce to protect its threats and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to apply early pressure and maintain momentum to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize.

The focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a quick and aggressive strategy, utilizing Satya, Aetherflux Genius as the commander. The deck includes a range of powerful creatures, spells, and abilities that can deal damage quickly and efficiently to gain control of the game. The deck is designed to maintain pressure on the opponent while also disrupting their strategy with counterspells and removal spells. With a mix of efficient creatures like True-Name Nemesis and Seasoned Pyromancer, along with powerful spells like Lightning Bolt and Swords to Plowshares, the deck aims to close out the game before the opponent has a chance to establish their own game plan.

The deck focuses on disrupting and controlling the opponent's resources while gradually building up its own advantage. It uses a variety of removal spells, discard effects, and board wipes to keep the opponent in check. The commander, Sheoldred, the Apocalypse, helps recur threats and generate value from opponent's graveyards. The deck also includes powerful black staples like Demonic Tutor, Liliana of the Veil, and Reanimate to further its game plan. With a high number of swamps and mana doublers like Cabal Coffers and Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth, the deck aims to outvalue and outgrind the opponent through attrition and resource denial.
